page.title: 11My hobbies by Craig Nevins
page.content: On a Monday, Tuesday and a Friday after school I go to band practice. Other times I go to the baths or play bowls. When it is raining I usually watch T.V. or play games. Sometimes on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Saturdays and Sundays I go out jogging round Consett.Sometimes my Dad takes me to play golf at{Beggars Wood {Recreation Park.}Other times I have a game of putt. My favourite kind of golf is crazy golf. Sometimes I get a book from the library. My favourite thing is drawing. I mainly draw Walt Disney characters and other cartoon characters like Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck and Tom and Jerry. Sometimes I just do patterns on squared paper. I also like playing football, snooker and pool.I also like looking after lizards and snakes.
